short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple notes extension for to-do lists etc.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A Simple notes / to-do extension. Supports markdown, multiple tabs and and more!


# Features:

## Lists + Text Formating
- Supports Bold, Italic, Underlined, Strike Through + combos & emoji üíñ 
- Indents (in and out of lists)
- Use tab or cmd + [ or ] to indent or un-indent
- Unordered lists as well


## Headers
- [# + space] for h1
- [## + space] for h2
- [### + space] for h3
- anytime this is done at the start of a line it will convert that line to a header.


## Links!
- Supports links! like this: www.google.com
- Select text and press [cmd + l] (cmd + lower case L) to turn into a link
- Also like this: google
   - Select a word and use cmd + l, then click the link to add a URL


## Context Menu
- [cmd + click for a menu]

---

- Syntax highlighting for code.
- Export data (so you can transfer between machines, or back it up)
- Rearrange tab order
- Key commands to switch between tabs
- Multiple color themes
- Spell checker?
- make this work with other extensions?!
- Settings:
   - Custom default window size
   - Custom fonts
   - Custom personalized color theme (select all the colors yourself)
